contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox dam | name = Xiluodu Dam | image = | caption = | official_name = 溪洛渡大坝 | crosses = [[Jinsha River]] | locale = Xiluodu Town, [[Yongshan County]], [[Yunnan]], [[China]] | type = Double-curvature arch, concrete | length = {{Convert|700|m|ft|0}} | height = {{Convert|278|m|ft|0}} | hydraulic_head = | width = | spillway_type = 7 x crest [[floodgates]], 5 x tunnels | spillway_capacity = | began = 2005 | open = 2013-2014 | closed = | cost = | owner = | maint = | reservoir = Xiluodu Reservoir | reservoir_capacity = {{Convert|12670000000|m3|acre.ft|0|lk=out}}<ref>{{cite web|title=Xiluodu|url=http://www.chincold.org.cn/dams/rootfiles/2010/07/20/1279253974175246-1279253974178251.pdf|publisher=Chinese National Committee on Large Dams|accessdate=3 January 2011}}</ref> | reservoir_catchment= | reservoir_surface = | depth = | plant_owner = | plant_operator = | turbines = 18 | installed_capacity = 0 | max_capacity = 13,860 [[Megawatt|MW]] | annual_generation = 64 [[TWh]] | pumped_storage = | com = | decom = | bridge_carries = | bridge_width = | bridge_clearance = | bridge_traffic = | bridge_toll = | bridge_id = | map_cue = | map_image = | map_text = | location_map = China | location_map_text = | lat_d = 28 | lat_m = 13 | lat_s = 02 | lat_NS = N | long_d = 103 | long_m = 33 | long_s = 46 | long_EW = E | coordinates_type = type:landmark | coordinates_display= inline,title | website = | extra = }} The '''Xiluodu Dam''' ({{zh|s=溪洛渡大坝|t=溪洛渡大壩|p=Xīluòdù Dàbà}}) is a [[hydroelectric dam]] project on the [[Jinsha River]], i.e. the upper course of the [[Yangtze River]] in [[People's Republic of China|China]]. In early 2005, the [[Government of the People's Republic of China|Chinese government]] halted the construction due to lack of environmental impact studies. Later, construction was restarted.<ref>[http://english.peopledaily.com.cn/90001/90776/90881/7224196.html World's fastest computer brings incalculable benefits]</ref> If completed, the Xiluodu Dam will be the third tallest dam in the world and a key component of the [[Jinsha river|Jinsha]] project. The total generating capacity will be 13,860 MW.<ref>{{cite web|title=ABB’s GCBs to protect large hydropower plants in China |url=http://www.abb.com/cawp/seitp202/983ba31d8f4c569dc12577b6002d5dab.aspx|accessdate=25 October 2010}}</ref> The dam site is located near Xiluodu [[town (China)|Town]], the county seat of [[Yunnan]]'s [[Yongshan County]]. The other side of the river is in [[Sichuan]]'s [[Leibo County]]. == See also == * [[List of power stations in China]] * [[Three Gorges Dam]] * [[Xiangjiaba Dam]] == References == {{Reflist}} [[Category:Proposed hydroelectric power stations]] [[Category:Economy of Yunnan]] [[Category:Hydroelectric power stations in Yunnan]] [[Category:Dams under construction]] [[Category:Dams in China]] [[Category:Dams on the Jinsha River]] [[Category:Buildings and structures under construction in China]] {{hydroelectric-power-plant-stub}} {{PRChina-powerstation-stub}}
